tool_description: Let’s delve into a comprehensive description of your Football Live Score API. This API provides real-time and low-latency updates for football enthusiasts, ensuring they stay up-to-date with the latest match developments.
name: Free Football Live Score
title: Free Football Live Score

api_list.name: all-leagues
api_list.description:
Here you will get list of all the popular leagues.

Contact to get unlimited access:
WhatsApp:- +91 7408157036
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://free-football-live-score.p.rapidapi.com/all-league"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "free-football-live-score.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
